item.title: Build basic Windows image with Packer on vSphere
item.author: Danielhanaj
item.description: In this blog post I will demonstrate how to build basic Windows 2016 image on vSphere using Packer.

item.title: Create vCenter Role for Packer using Terraform
item.author: Danielhanaj
item.description: In this blog post I would like to demonstrate how to create dedicated role for HashiCorp Packer and assign permissions on vCenter objects using Terraform.
